list.name: Changes
list.comment: - **Refactor `index.js` for multiple CodeSandbox exercises**: Improved readability and maintainability by refactoring `index.js` files across multiple exercises. - **Add new React components to `index.js`**: Added new React components and improved state management for better modularity in exercises involving dynamic rendering. - **Enhance event handling and lifecycle methods in `index.js`**: Introduced enhancements in event handling and refined the use of React lifecycle methods to improve performance and user interaction across various projects.

change.afterPath: $PROJECT_DIR$/../discoverwv/untitled folder/img/cities /charleston/Charleston _ West Virginia, History, Population, Map, & Facts _ Britannica copy.pdf

task.summary: Default task
"Update index.html: Added hero section, navigation links, and footer for enhanced layout"
Add JavaScript functionality for hamburger menu toggle and link interactions
"Add styles for hero section, navigation, and footer to enhance layout and responsiveness"
"Add .gitignore to exclude IDE configuration files and workspace settings"
"Update project card layout to reduce redundancy and improve accessibility"
"Add styling for skills section and resize skill icons for better consistency"
"Add skill icons for portfolio skills section"
Updated index.html to include Bitmoji images in the hero, about, and skills sections, enhancing personal branding and visual appeal.
Added styling for Bitmoji images in hero, about, and skills sections to improve alignment, sizing, and visual consistency across the website.
Added Bitmoji images for hero, about, and skills sections to enhance personal branding and website interactivity.

Update HTML files for Better Dumpsters Today
- Updated 404, contact, index, and services pages for Better Dumpsters Today.
# Commit the new file

Add .idea directories to .gitignore: Updated .gitignore to exclude .idea directories generated by IDEs to prevent committing local project settings.
Add environment-specific and IDE settings to .gitignore: Enhanced .gitignore file to prevent unnecessary environment-specific and IDE-generated files (e.g., .idea) from being tracked in version control.
Modified AssemblyAttributes.cs to align with the .NET 6.0 framework for improved compatibility and debugging in the testing environment.
Updated 404.html to provide a more user-friendly error message and navigation suggestions, enhancing the user experience when encountering a broken link.

- **Refactor App.js components for modularity**: Updated several instances of `App.js` across multiple feature branches to improve modularity, readability, and reusability of components. - **Add new features and optimize existing logic in App.js**: Implemented new UI components and optimized logic for better performance and maintainability. - **Enhance user interaction in App.js**: Added interactive features to `App.js`, such as form validation, improved modal functionality, and enhanced animations for a more engaging user experience.

- **Update Bootstrap files to v5.3.2**: Added and updated Bootstrap CSS and JS files to version 5.3.2, including utility classes, grid, and reboot styles, ensuring consistent and modern styling across the project. - **Add Bootstrap minified map files for better debugging**: Included `.map` files for Bootstrap v5.3.2 CSS and JS to enhance debugging and support during development. - **Improve RTL support for Bootstrap utilities**: Updated Bootstrap utility files to include better right-to-left language support by adding `bootstrap-utilities.rtl.min.css`.

- **Update workspace settings for multiple CodeSandbox modules**: Updated `workspace.json` files across various CodeSandbox modules to adjust environment configurations, ensuring consistent development settings. - **Add workspace.xml to `.idea` folder for project settings**: Added `workspace.xml` to track the local workspace settings within the `.idea` directory for `better-dumpsters-today`, allowing for a unified configuration in development.

- **Update styles for CodeSandbox practice exercises**: Modified `styles.css` across multiple modules to enhance UI consistency, including improved spacing, font sizes, and color schemes for a better user experience. - **Add new CSS rules for exercise enhancements**: Added new CSS rules in `styles.css` for specific practice exercises to introduce new layout adjustments and styling improvements. - **Refactor CSS to ensure better readability and modularity**: Cleaned up and refactored CSS files to improve readability, remove redundancy, and ensure a more modular approach to styling across different exercises.

- **Update `package.json` dependencies across CodeSandbox modules**: Updated `package.json` dependencies to ensure compatibility with the latest versions of libraries used across different CodeSandbox exercises. - **Add new scripts to `package.json` for testing and building**: Added new build and testing scripts in `package.json` to streamline development and deployment processes. - **Remove redundant dependencies from `package.json`**: Cleaned up `package.json` by removing unnecessary or redundant dependencies to enhance maintainability and reduce package bloat.

- **Refactor `script.js` files for multiple CodeSandbox exercises**: Refactored `script.js` files to improve readability and modularity across different practice exercises. - **Add new functionality to `script.js` for event handling**: Introduced new event handling logic in `script.js` for exercises involving user interaction, enhancing the learning experience. - **Optimize `script.js` for performance**: Removed redundant code and optimized JavaScript logic to improve performance and efficiency across CodeSandbox modules.

- **Update `index.html` for CodeSandbox exercises**: Updated `index.html` files across multiple exercises to improve accessibility, including better use of semantic HTML elements and ARIA attributes. - **Refactor structure of `index.html` for cleaner code**: Refactored the structure of `index.html` to improve readability, maintainability, and enhance the consistency of elements across different exercises. - **Add new content and navigation elements**: Added new navigation elements and improved internal linking in `index.html` to make exercises more user-friendly and to enhance navigation flow.

- **Refactor `index.js` for multiple CodeSandbox exercises**: Improved readability and maintainability by refactoring `index.js` files across multiple exercises. - **Add new React components to `index.js`**: Added new React components and improved state management for better modularity in exercises involving dynamic rendering. - **Enhance event handling and lifecycle methods in `index.js`**: Introduced enhancements in event handling and refined the use of React lifecycle methods to improve performance and user interaction across various projects.

Misc updates
